scripts.build:prod:docker:push: sudo docker build -t spottel/success-journal-clickup:latest . && sudo docker push spottel/success-journal-clickup:latest
scripts.pushDockerReadme: sudo docker run --rm -v '/data/visualcode_data/data/workspace/Data/Success-Journal-Clickup/README.md':'/data/README.md' -e DOCKERHUB_USERNAME='user' -e DOCKERHUB_PASSWORD='password' -e DOCKERHUB_REPO_PREFIX=spottel -e DOCKERHUB_REPO_NAME=success-journal-clickup sheogorath/readme-to-dockerhub:latest
